document_data.name: Nilmaldor
document_data.mainbody:
'''Nilmaldor''' was a Knight-Gallant of [[Ascalhorn]].

After his death, Nimaldor's spirit guarded the Ascalhorn crypt in which he was buried, and even fought and defeated a [[wraith]] at one point, although this weakened him greatly. No longer able to guard the crypt, it was soon overrun by [[rat]]s and giant [[spider]]s.
